Managing data science projects is hard.


::: {.cell filename='dockerfile'}

```{.r .cell-code}
scott
```
:::

::: {.cell filename='compose.yml'}

```{.r .cell-code}
scott
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.bash .cell-code}
docker-compose -f compose.yml up -d
docker-compose -f compose.yml down
```
